short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: KDP Auto-Fill helps you upload your books much faster with auto fill system to save you time and the hustle.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: KDP Auto Fill Help you save the book information and details so you don't have to fill it out every time you want to upload a book. it saves you a lot of time and hustle and also there are no errors or typos once you do the first filling correctly.
